solution_line_template: Talia first drives {miles_to_park} miles to the park + {miles_park_to_store} miles from the park to the grocery store = <<{miles_to_park}+{miles_park_to_store}={miles_to_store}>>{miles_to_store} miles.

She next drives {miles_store_to_home} miles from the store to home + the first {miles_to_store} miles = <<{miles_store_to_home}+{miles_to_store}={total_miles}>>{total_miles} miles Talia drives that day.
